title: NO end to fuel queues in Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankans from all walks of life continue wait in line for fuel, as the shortage has not been addressed.
At the same time, filling stations have been advised to restrict the issuance of fuel for barrels and cans.
The Energy Minister, Gamini Lokuge said the decision was taken to reduce unnecessary stockpiling.
Charles Leclerc wins dramatic Bahrain F1 GP as Ferrari bring home one-two
Murder at the Filling Station : Motorcyclist stabbed by Three-wheeler driver
